Package pitt.search.lucene

Package containing some basic Lucene untilities for creating and searching indexes, particularly bilingual indexes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
FilePositionDoc This class makes a minor modification to org.apache.lucene.FileDocument such that it records TermPositionVectors for each document
IndexBilingualFiles Index pairs of bilingual texts in a parallel corpus.
IndexFilePositions Index all text files under a directory.
LuceneSearch Simple standalone class for searching a lucene index.
 

Package pitt.search.lucene Description

Package containing some basic Lucene untilities for creating and searching indexes, particularly bilingual indexes.

Author:
Dominic Widdows, in collaboration with Kathleen Ferraro and the University of Pittsburgh.
